comment: Sucks

comment: good stuff

comment: Useful

author: Edz Lumakin
comment: love it

author: Ben Liu
comment: Latest version broke my Google photos connection. Not showing any photos even though I'm logged in. Using LG Urbane 2.

author: Martin Simeonov
comment: So if I want to see all of my photos on the watch I have to pay :)  Not only the loading times of the pictures are ridiculously slow, the quality is mediocre at best, the horrible ads, but then when you need the application to do its job it tells you you have to pay if you want to see ALL of the pictures. Then why on earth don't you make it a paid application in the first place, without the ads and get it over with??? Absolutely horrible way of selling your product. Immediate uninstall.

author: Abby Baron
comment: It tells me no photos found with the loading icon, I thought purchasing premium would fix it. But still nothing. Wish it would work.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Abby, please contact support@appfour.com for help.

author: Manny_522
comment: I already purchased this app for 10 dollars. I had to factory restart my Android Wear and it wants me to purchase it again and I did! I expect a full refund because when I purchased it the first time it said I'm getting a flat rate for all the future apps. This is not right. You should not lie to your customers.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Manny, this is most likely a Google issue. Please restart your smartwatch, which normally solves this problem. Also make sure the app you made the App Flat purchase on is installed on your device before restarting. If you need assistance please contact support@appfour.com. Thank you.

author: Mouli Rathinavel
comment: Don't need to purchase a photo watch face app to make your photos to display with time...simply open the photo in this app and leave it for few seconds the time will display simultaneously on top of the screen..

comment: This app, Literally forces you to pay, to do anything. It cant find pictures, Forces you to pay to see pictures, and, I aint gonna fund this garbage.

comment: the app sucks doesn't allow you to see all your files without paying

comment: What? It just says, no photos found, & everything I click on tells me to buy the premium app.

reply.content: Hi Milton, please send your request to our support team via support@appfour.com. We are happy to help!

author: Saurya Janbandhu
comment: My watch shows no photos found...Even when I've bought the premium app yet no photos found comes upon the screen...

reply.content: Hi Saura, please contact support@appfour.com for help. We need a little more information in order to assist and evaluate if this is a bug.

author: Siddhesh Tari
comment: It should also when on airplane mode or when Bluetooth connection cannot be established

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. At this point this is technically not possible, you will need either BT connection or having your devices each connected to the internet via WiFi or mobile networks.

author: Michelle Evans
comment: I have paid for all apps for 8.99 and it's still asking me to upgrade to full version ???????????? Can you please sort this ASAP please or at least refund me.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Michelle, please make sure the app you purchased the bundle with is installed on your device and simply restart your smartwatch. If your issue is persisting our support team will be there for you to help or refund. Your request should go to support@appfour.com, if you need further assistance.

author: Aureliano Cilocilo
comment: Nice apps..

I downloaded this app yesterday & it worked once but now it's failing to connect with my watch. I tried restarting the watch & this still didn't resolve the problem. Upon reading some of the other reviews I realize that this is a common problem that others are having as well. Please fix this issue & I will download the app again. Thanks!

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: We will look into it. Please check out our future versions. Thank you for your report.

author: Chris quevas
comment: I have paid for the full version twice already since I have downloaded his app after update I have lost all paid access

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Chris, this is normally a Google issue and solved by simply restarting your smartwatch. If you still have any problems please do not hesitate to contact our support via support@appfour.com. Thank you.

comment: Bayarnya ribet

author: Martinez Green
comment: Great app

author: Adolfo Zamora
comment: I do not have full access to all appfour bundle even though I paid the flat rate for full access.  I was given several instructions that would resolve my issue and none of them worked.  I uninstalled, reinstalled appfour and even went as far as to do a factory reset on my smart watch but nothing worked.  I  finally contacted Trixi, appfour support team member, and was instructed to repurchase the bundle and the repurchase price would be refunded since all their suggestions did not resolve my problem of not have full access.  I sent a response to make sure once I repurchase bundle, the cost would be refunded.  I have yet to receive a reply giving me the green light.  Thi makes me skeptical and maybe they just anted me to charge me twice for the bundle I had already paid for.  I would really appreciate if another support team member would get in contact with me to resolve this issue.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Adolfo, please just send us your order number and you will receive a refund immediately. We did not intend to put you into any trouble, rather having a quick solution for this problem, which is normally a Google related issue and solved by rebooting your smartwatch. If you did not get a reply please resend your message to support@appfour.com.

author: Tony Mateo
comment: I'm not completely sure why these wear apps don't have solid 4 and above ratings. They work perfectly fine and far better than most of the built in apps. Keep it up appfour! I paid to support.

author: Steve Costello
comment: Very nice app for looking at pictures have a nice zoom in zoom out without this app you cannot view pictures on your watch bought it as a bundle with about 10 other apps $9.99 I think it's a very good bye
